ygData.subject: Re: Executioner Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: IMHO, you shouldn t lay down the plat to buy an Executioner s Axe. The last time I saw them, they cost around 1kpp (probably dropped a bit since
ygData.messageBody:
IMHO, you shouldn't lay down the plat to buy an
Executioner's Axe. The last time I saw them, they cost around
1kpp (probably dropped a bit since then).<br><br>For
less than that, you could get a Runic Carver - 18/37,
2hs. Almost the exact same damage to delay ratio, plus
you will get more swings in. More swings = more aggro
= good warrior. :)<br><br>Or, if a sword is not to
your liking, you could pick up a Mithril Staff -
28/45, 2hb. Again, better than the Mithril Staff in
every way.<br><br>The haste proc on the Executioner's
Axe seems to be more annoying than anything. Not only
is the proc infrequent, it does overwrite enchanter
haste and lasts only 10 seconds. It's not really enough
to make a difference you'll notice.<br><br>You could
either the Carver or the Staff for under 1kpp, if not
substantially less. I've seen Carvers for sale around 500pp, so
that might be something to shoot
for.<br><br>Iskandar<br>51 champion of Prexus
